about.text1: Between 1981 and 1989, the Blessed Virgin Mary appeared to several young people in Kibeho, Rwanda. She came as "Nyina wa Jambo" (Mother of the Word) to call humanity to conversion, reconciliation, and prayer.
about.text2: Our Lady revealed the devotion to her Seven Sorrows and warned of coming trials while offering hope through prayer and penance. Her message remains as relevant today as it was then.
